Classes

class  FdoIDescribeSchema
 The FdoIDescribeSchema interface defines the DescribeSchema command, which describes the feature schemas available from the connection. The DescribeSchema command can describe a single schema or all schemas available from the connection. The Execute operation returns an FdoFeatureSchemaCollection object. More...
